name: wuntp
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl5eqel(ctp(c0, c1, c2), c3, cun(csn(c0), cpr(c1, c2)), w0)

comment: A weak universe is closed under unordered triple. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
